fitScore.recommendedImprovements: Study cloud deployment patterns and container orchestration

studyPlan.title: Arrays + Strings
studyPlan.description: Master fundamental array and string manipulation techniques

studyPlan.title: System Design Basics
studyPlan.description: Understand the fundamentals of scalable system design

studyPlan.title: Database & Scaling
studyPlan.description: Learn database optimization and horizontal scaling strategies

studyPlan.title: API Design Patterns
studyPlan.description: Master RESTful API design and best practices

studyPlan.title: Distributed Systems
studyPlan.description: Dive deep into distributed systems concepts

studyPlan.title: Final Review & Tips
studyPlan.description: Review key concepts and interview preparation tips

practiceQuestions.title: Design a highly scalable URL shortener service
practiceQuestions.description: You need to design a URL shortening service like bit.ly. Handle millions of users and provide analytics.

practiceQuestions.title: How would you handle 10 million concurrent users?
practiceQuestions.description: Design an architecture that can support 10 million concurrent users with minimal latency.

practiceQuestions.title: Explain your approach to database sharding
practiceQuestions.description: Discuss strategies for horizontal partitioning of database data.

practiceQuestions.title: Design a real-time notification system
practiceQuestions.description: Build a system that delivers notifications in real-time to millions of users.

practiceQuestions.title: How do you ensure system reliability and uptime?
practiceQuestions.description: Discuss strategies for maintaining high availability and disaster recovery.

practiceQuestions.title: Design Social Network Feed
practiceQuestions.description: Design the feed system for a social network like Facebook or Twitter.
keyDiscussionPoints: Fan-out on write vs fan-out on read

peopleInRole.name: Alex Chen
peopleInRole.background: Started as a Full Stack Developer, specialized in Backend
peopleInRole.interviewTip: Focus on system design fundamentals and practice explaining your architecture decisions clearly.

peopleInRole.name: Jordan Martinez
peopleInRole.background: Tech Lead focused on distributed systems and scalability
peopleInRole.interviewTip: Be prepared to discuss real production challenges. They ask about trade-offs and pragmatic solutions.

peopleInRole.name: Casey Rodriguez
peopleInRole.background: Transitioned from IC to management, responsible for team hiring
peopleInRole.interviewTip: Show your growth mindset and collaborative skills. They care about cultural fit as much as technical skills.

peopleInRole.name: Morgan Lee
peopleInRole.interviewTip: Deep knowledge of deployment pipelines and infrastructure is crucial. Know your containerization.
